website_summaries.verdict: Standard 12-inch Pilates ring with studio-quality construction, well-liked by advanced practitioners.
pros: Dual-sided foam pads prevent the ring from slipping away from your body
Offers an ample amount of resistance for more intense sessions
Available in three fun colors to match other home gym accessories
cons: Somewhat more stiff than other options, which not all practitioners seem to like

customer_reviews.title: The ring will be perfect for those days at home when I am working ...
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I expected! It did not have the Workout Guide which was supposed to be included. I emailed them and within an hour, had the guide by email. I am very impressed. Have just started working out again after 10 years, on a Pilates Reformer. The ring will be perfect for those days at home when I am working out alone. I am so looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Have used for two introductory classes so far and love it. Can't imagine spending $25 or more. Thank you URBNFit for making affordable quality equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Compact and good for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today. I can't believe how small and compact it is! I travel for work and will definitely be taking this with me to keep up the toning exercises when I'm gone. Perfect for what I need. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: L. Milner

customer_reviews.title: I love the stiffness in the ring. It helps me work harder
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Already is making a difference. And, I love the exercise sheet that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: MVV

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: My Physical Therapist recommended the Pilates Ring for exercises that will strengthen my SI joint. The product arrived the next day and it has been amazing! I love it! There are so many things you can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to my yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and I love the sheet it came with that displays several excellent exercises you could use with it. And the price was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and flexible
customer_reviews.text: I found this 12 inch ring a perfect size to do all the Pilates exercises at the gym. The ring is lightweight yet it provides a good amount of resistance. The padded handles are very easy to grip. Lastly, I love the pink color of this ring.
customer_reviews.author: I. E. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love this pilates ring
customer_reviews.text: This pilates ring is awsome ! It tones your body very fast ..faster than going to the gym ..highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Pierrette L. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: It's functionally fine and suitable for the exercises that I have to do, but would be easier to use if the inner diameter was a couple of inches larger.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed something to strengthen my theighs, as I’ve had osteoarthritis since 24 and at 30, my knees are getting worse, so the Dr. thought it would be useful. I would say that this does help. It doesn’t hurt the knees when using (if you have the same problem as me) like some equipment; you can feel it in the outer and inner theighs, or if you’re working the arms, you can also feel it working. The only thing that’s a downside is I’ve tried doing some YouTube workouts with the device and find myself having problems with it staying and not wanting it to move.
customer_reviews.author: Banales876

customer_reviews.title: Great Resistance
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of time to work out in the mornings. This ring gives such good resistance that you can do many less reps and get better results. You can work every part of your body. It's amazing!!! I gave the product only 4 stars because it came with a sheet that shows only about 8 exercises. So I needed to web surf and Youtube to find the many ways in which this could be used. So my advice to the manufacturer, give a decent guide to your buyers or put something on your website. They shouldn't have to surf all over the place to figure out the many ways this item can be used.
customer_reviews.author: Product Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Spent my money, now what?
customer_reviews.text: The ad promises a workout guide. No guide. No instructions on paper. Can't find exercises for the ring on internet. I'm NOT a pilates activist. I'm 85 years old and used a ring in physical therapy in place of a ball and stretch band. Liked the idea but now stuck with: "What the heck else can I do besides squeeze it or "spread it" with my knees? HEEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLP!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie32

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: I usually do yoga but decided to add this to my routine. It is a nice alternative to add for stretching my hips and legs, which is why I basically bought it. Very easy to use and you can get the workouts on Youtube to try new stuff with it. I didn't think the workouts they send you to download were much help so definitely check out Youtube for more workouts with it. It makes a good ab cruncher also.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far. Flexible yet gives enough tension.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea which Pilates ring to buy and really didn’t want to spend for the most expensive one. Very happy with my choice. I’m new to Pilates and Bought it to use with some YouTube videos I found, like with Trifecta Pilates. I find I even bring the ring over to my TV area and just use it randomly while I watch Netflix or something. I told my husband tonight, I think this is the best $15 I ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: shellync

customer_reviews.title: Grips are great, very flexible ring, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it but so far so good! I own another 12" ring by Yoga Evo, which I like alot, but I wanted to try one with differently padded grips. The shape, size and padding of these grips is great for obtaining a secure, solid grasp. The ring has much more give or flexibility than my other. This is a real plus for exercising my arms, weakest part of me. Though when I do that thigh adductor exercise, I can really squish this ring. There is resistance, I just hope that continues. Seems very well made. I like it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Companion
customer_reviews.text: I do my own home workouts. I have lots of different pieces of equipment. I started doing more pilates and find this fitness ring to be helpful in enhancing my workouts allowing me to get deeper into the exercise. This is a comfortable ring. The pads on either side of the ring make it versatile and convenient to manipulate for different exerices. It's meant to simply give a good resistance. The price is very good for the quality. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I lost my strength to cancer 5 1/2 years ago and I am using this to get it back. I use it every other day and love. it. Does it work (YES). I would highly recommend it. Thank U. Linda
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  IMO, a "tad more" resistance than other brands.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one, and 2 other "top-rated" brands, and found this one to have "just a tad" tougher resistance than the others, so I sent the others back. Great for exercises while sitting at the computer!
customer_reviews.author: DDT

customer_reviews.title: Annoying styrofoam squeak
customer_reviews.text: Most things about the URBN Fit ring are great. The resistance of the ring is a nice medium. The size is slightly small.. but I knew that going in. Overall the build quality seems good. Except for this annoying squeak when applying anything greater than a slight pressure to the ring. It sounds a bit like styrofoam rubbing up against something.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! I Wish I Had Ordered A Different Brand
customer_reviews.text: The foam was coming off the plastic ring from the first use! This Pilates ring is very cheap and after one use, the shape of the ring has distorted. It’s just very disappointing, and I don’t feel in good conscience that I could ever recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: No real workout help!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking that it came with actual use help/video guide or a website but instead I paid nearly $3 more for a sheet of paper labelled Workout guide. Just as a heads up, if you are looking for this product, buy it WITHOUT the workout guide.
customer_reviews.author: A b

customer_reviews.title: Nice exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: This Pilates Ring seems well built with quality materials. I have been using it for hip, core and shoulder exercises. It provides a nice workout without needing much equipment. I've been using it with my patients in physical therapy and they have all enjoyed it and we're surprised by how challenging some of the exercises can be. The exercises provided can be improved upon, but there are plenty of resources online and on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect resistance-based workout buddy. And it's very light and portable. This ring offers the right amount of resistance for the routines I employ. For more Pilates Ring routines, there are a lot of them available on YouTube. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Emerick

customer_reviews.title: if you have preexisting back pain, talk to your doctor first
customer_reviews.text: This device aggravated my back pain, the device itself is nice tho I hard trouble figuring it how exactly to use it until I found a video of the use in my YouTube inbox. I was out of commission for over a week and needed an X-ray. The device is great, the problem is my existing chronic back pain.
customer_reviews.author: June.

customer_reviews.title: pilates studio quality ring fitness circle
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed Pilates for many years, and have used ring fitness circle equipment in a studio setting. With the CV-19 curtailing many of my fitness routines, I ordered this fitness circle and am pleased with the sturdiness and durability. It is just like one that you would use at a Pilates studio.
customer_reviews.author: Marsita

customer_reviews.title: Great Pilates Ring
customer_reviews.text: Same type of ring I use in my Pilates mat class at the gym. Very happy with it and appears to be well made and the right size for me. Be careful when you order any ring because they do come in different sizes and I had to return another ring I ordered because it was a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Daily

customer_reviews.title: Handy Size For Smaller People
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this pilates ring (durability, resistance level, size) but the shape of the "handles" dig into my inner thighs when I use it between my legs so I bought a different ring with curved sleeves instead of what's on this ring.
customer_reviews.author: The O

customer_reviews.title: Product exactly as promised PLUS a free gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on the suggestion of my pilates instructor. It arrived in two days, in tact and ready to use. The tension, size and durability is comparable to the magic circles I use at my studio. In addition there is a downloadable workout guide available for android and IOS phones so you can take your workout wherever you go! You are also offered a Gift if you choose to claim it. Its FREE except for shipping. I chose the $5 gift card which had no shipping.
customer_reviews.author: P. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Love my Pilate Ring
customer_reviews.text: I go to Pilates a lot and I was just looking for something like this to use it in my work out classes, this help me tremendously with my exercises and get to the part that I need to reach, like my inner thighs, arms, my abs and also, help me stretch my back more easily, specially my lower back!, love this one worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: IVETH

customer_reviews.title: Great for pilates
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ring to do pilates at home. This ring is about the same size and weight to those I used in the yoga class. I like the bright pink color. It's a good exercise tool.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it while working from home on my thighs and arms . After work I do Pilates moves and tighten my core great ring multiple uses it’s great thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tonya motley

customer_reviews.title: Just got it
customer_reviews.text: I just got the URBNFit Pilates Ring Fitness Circle. I am learning to work with it. It is easy to use right out of the box. YEAH! Now comes the workout.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great pilates product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Really helps with stretching and toning. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: 4DogLover

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I have different size rings ....and, I bought this slightly smaller one to put in my suitcase for travel. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: kjh

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and a great burn
customer_reviews.text: My wife used this pilates ring and reports she has never been more sore! She loves it. She's found a bunch of great uses for it. We love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Burrup

customer_reviews.title: fit fitness into busy day
customer_reviews.text: not a hard core work out but it allows me to fit in leg fitness while i am reading or knitting. good low intensity workout
customer_reviews.author: spinnerknitter

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about exercise equipment? This is the same as at physical therapy. Feel assured we're getting the same exercise / benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Use for physical therapy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Clean. I use this for physical therapy and it works great. It’s not as big but does the job just the same
customer_reviews.author: M.Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solid work out Pilates Ring - I like it and especially love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Pilates ring to enhance my mat Pilates. This ring seems to be sturdy and will serve the purpose for my use.
customer_reviews.author: KJPayne58

customer_reviews.title: Love this as an extra boost
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my normal yoga work out and even doing 10 minutes, you will feel it the next day!
customer_reviews.author: wildchild1804

customer_reviews.title: Another great tool in our Stroke Recovery Workouts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after watching my husband use this with his trainer. He is 4 years post stroke and still has very little use of his arm. His leg is still very weak. He loves this because unlike just squeezing a ball, this is a very good visual stimulator and he pushes himself to see more results. We love it, we love that it is hard work, but rewarding.
customer_reviews.author: Marendy Mills

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Size is just right for my 5-foot wife. It is not too stiff. She gets a real good workout and so she's happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mg259

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend. Exactly what she was hoping for. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S Altman

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great therapy tool. My therapist recommended I purchase this so I did and if you follow the directions ....you can use a lot of your muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Bray

customer_reviews.title: Quality item, feels great to use!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for easy Pilates workouts! it's sturdy, feels great between your legs and your arms. I'm impressed at how simple it actually is to use as a newbie workout person.
customer_reviews.author: AshBox

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ring is ok. Many videos online to use with it. A bit slippery on skin and with workout gear on
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works and will help develop strength as it is hard to move.
customer_reviews.author: T W

customer_reviews.title: Seems promising
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to take on trip. Used prior, so far so good, traveled well
customer_reviews.author: L. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Great Pilates Exercise Tool
customer_reviews.text: This pilates ring is perfect for doing Pilates exercises in your own home.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: Helps me workout lots!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received the Pilates Ring I've was super excited. I started using it the same day. It was really helpful to have how you can use it with all the different excersises. I definitely recommend this ring!
customer_reviews.author: Nisa

customer_reviews.title: quality product 👌
customer_reviews.text: best piece of exercise equipment i ever invested in thanks 😊
customer_reviews.author: L. Cynor

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Was way sturdier than expected and has too much tension. Does not stretch out at all, which I thought it would so if that’s what you think this does then this is not what you need. May have misread how you use it. For me not a good fit but for those who ate already pretty fit might like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Pilates ring
customer_reviews.text: Typical Pilates ring! I’ve used many Pilates rings over the years. Quality is really good. Adds a little extra resistance and inclusion of more muscle groups with most exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to work on my legs while I am sitting
customer_reviews.author: Janice K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for resistance training
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good. I love that it comes in a color I want! I like that the size is portable and I can store it behind a desk out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Di

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Really stiff. Not for beginner. Resistance is too much for me, but I will get used to it hopefully
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for all levels of ability
customer_reviews.text: This ring is very well made and sturdy. It came super fast too!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my workout
customer_reviews.text: Seems good so far! Great addition to my workout. Not sure about durability yet since I’ve only had it for a couple weeks but otherwise very happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Although easy to use, it feels cheap like is only cardboard inside

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions Included
customer_reviews.text: There was no information included on workout information, as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel French

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: First time using it, I thought I was going to break it. It make cracking noises. But never cracked or broke, so I dont know what that's about. But it's actually great
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Joachims

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Came in a timely manner. Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sally J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It’s east
customer_reviews.text: I have have had stiff shoulders for years. Within two daws the pain and the knits were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Shopper.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for your Pilates workouts
customer_reviews.text: I am a personal trainer and Pilates instructor. I love this Pilates ring very much. Great durability. I’m excited to use it

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: Love my pilates ring, easy to use and came with a good exercise manual

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great price! Really good quality as well. I have brought a similar product in the past that was the same quality but for a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Pilates Circle
customer_reviews.text: This is great for doing Pilates work outs. It is made of good material and didn't feel flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product...but...
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Has good tension...Unfortunately, I had hoped it would increase strength in my shoulder/upper arms...instead has flared up the pain. Too much tension for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This one is smaller than the one I use in class.

customer_reviews.title: Study & lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy for me to use & feels very sturdy. I also like the color.

customer_reviews.title: An easy to use, convenient workout tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for inner thigh workout! Great for pecs, and abductors too!

customer_reviews.title: Rey happy with the Pilates ring by Urbnfit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the fitness ring. It is just like the one they use in my Pilates class. Great to use at home

customer_reviews.title: Easy and you can take it with you
customer_reviews.text: Love it just what I needed. Provides the right pressure in the right places at least for me my legs and hips

customer_reviews.title: Workout247
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy does what it’s supposed to do! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lanci

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to use. Even for someone like me who has back issues.
customer_reviews.author: Orien

customer_reviews.title: My physical therapist used this during my sessions...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great device to help you build up your core muscles and it only costs pennies!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Balabanow

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Conceptually, a good product but poor cushioning. Rigid plastic sounds ready to snap. Cushioned bracing points are painful, reducing body comfort to effectively use for full use. Better to buy a higher end product than this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as sturdy or tough as the rings you use in physical therapy offices. Plus the pink color came totally stained with dirty black marks.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pilates ring.
customer_reviews.text: Seems as good as what I use at LA Fitness.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure god or bad
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived the box was damage, no big deal, but no instructions or email where to learn how to use it. From the sale video i tried and bruise my legs. Not sure how to rate it yet or if I should return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, nothing to set up
customer_reviews.text: I keep it under my kitchen counter, grab it while I’m on the phone, great for stress I relief, can use it anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Professional grade. A bit smaller than what I have seen in gyms, which is a huge plus for me. It still provides all of the functionality, but it is portable enough to throw into a backpack to take somewhere or carry-on luggage to travel with. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Love this “magic circle”! It’s a pretty teal color which makes workouts more fun, right?! The circle is very well made and the resistance is taught and the notches are comfortable enough and don’t slip.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Very well made. Easy to use. Missing instructions but they can be found online. Recommend & small enough to travel with.

customer_reviews.title: No workout guide included
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a good quality product. However, it says to "utilize the URBAN fit workout guide", but there was no guide included.

customer_reviews.title: Learning to use
customer_reviews.text: The first time i used the ring it made a cracking sound. I was afraid it had broken but it wasn't. So far i like it. I thought it may have came with an instruction sheet with some exercises but it didn't. If they added that it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I used it!
customer_reviews.text: I took this out of the box and flexed it to see how strong the tension was......it snapped and broke. RETURNED

customer_reviews.text: I really love this pilates ring! Great quality. I found plenty of videos on YouTube for workouts to use it with.

customer_reviews.text: love it so far...excited to use on a regular basis!!!

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Suck

customer_reviews.title: but I do like it for stretching it's very helpful for leg stetches

product_meta.title: URBNFit Pilates Ring Fitness Circle - Weight Loss Body Toning Magic Circle and Resistance Exercise Fitness Ring Free Workout Guide Included
feature_bullets: TONE AND BUILD MUSCLE - Get a full body workout that delivers results and elevates your fitness routine whether you are in a pilates class or your living room. By utilizing the fitness ring’s resistance you’ll be able to sculpt problem areas like outer and inner thighs, upper arms, Abs and chest

WILL NEVER CRACK OR BREAK - Made from durable fiberglass with a rubber outer sleeve, the ring will not bend permanently or crack. The fitness ring will always maintain its shape and reform back into a circle even after the most strenuous exercises
LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE - The pilates ring conveniently fits into your luggage or carry on. Measuring 12 inches and weighing less than 1 pound, you’ll never have to miss a workout while traveling

DUAL SIDED PADS - The foam sweat resistant pads on the inside and outside of the resistance ring allow for a more comfortable and balanced workout. You can place the ring between your thighs, and press down on the outer pads for a great thigh workout, or hold up the ring with both hands in front of your chest and press on the pads for an effective chest exercise
